name: What has happened over time
description: Information on changes made to the Value Set Definition over time, and also has a contained audit trail of all such changes.

element.definition: Information on changes made to the Value Set Definition over time, and also has a contained audit trail of all such changes.
unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references).
An Extension

element.name: name
element.short: The name of this set of history entries
element.definition: Label for a set of entries, such as a version.
element.comments: Typically, a value set will have a set of history entries for each major publication milestone.

element.definition: unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references).

element.name: extension
element.definition: An Extension

element.short: identifies the meaning of the extension
element.definition: Source of the definition for the extension code - a logical name or a URL.
element.comments: The definition may point directly to a computable or human-readable definition of the extensibility codes, or it may be a logical URI as declared in some other specification. The definition should be version specific.  This will ideally be the URI for the Resource Profile defining the extension, with the code for the extension after a #.

element.definition: Value of extension - may be a resource or one of a constrained set of the data types (see Extensibility in the spec for list).

element.name: revision
element.short: Audit of all changes for a history entry
element.definition: A list of specific changes, who made them and when.
unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references).
An Extension

element.name: date
element.definition: Date the change took place.
unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references).

element.definition: Value of extension - may be a resource or one of a constrained set of the data types (see Extensibility in the spec for list).

element.name: id
element.short: Version marker after the change was made
element.definition: Unique id for the specific change.

element.definition: Person or device responsible for the change.
